overview: Here at NorthStar we have nothing against vegetarians but we TRULY love the meat eaters! Yes it's that time again... Sweet oral sluts that want to take on the sausage factory in your pants - kielbasa, knockwurst, bratwurst - whatever you want to call it they will devour it! And they love to play with their food... They'll lick it and smack it on their tongues as well as all over their faces! So if YOU have an appetite for dirty sluts that love to suck and swallow c*ck, I think we have what you're hungry for!
title: Deep Throat This 40
